name: transfers_list
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool transfermarket.
Tool description: This API helps to query for transfer news, latest or record transfers, rumors, player market value, etc... to create a sporting site/application such as transfermarkt.com
API description: Fetches a list of football player transfers based on various filter criteria.

competitionid.description: The ID of the competition. Should be obtained from the /search or /competitions/list endpoints. Do not use together with clubid.

positiongroup.description: The position group of the players. Possible values are 'Abwehr', 'Mittelfeld', 'Sturm'.

limit.description: The number of items per response for paging purposes. Defaults to 30.

maxvalue.description: The maximum market value of players. Example: 151000000.

positionid.description: One of the following 1-Goalkeeper|2-Sweeper|3-Centre-Back|4-Left-Back|5-Right-Back|6-Defensive Midfield|7-Central Midfield|8-Right Midfield|9-Left Midfield|10-Attacking Midfield|11-Left Winger|12-Right Winger|13-Second Striker|14-Centre-Forward

clubid.description: The ID of the club. Should be obtained from the /search or /clubs/list-by-competition endpoints. Do not use together with competitionid.

minvalue.description: The minimum market value of players. Example: 9000000.

offset.description: The offset for paging purposes. Defaults to 0.

domain.description: The domain for the request. Possible values are 'com', 'de', 'be', 'es', 'it', 'nl', 'pl', 'pt', 'com.tr', and 'world'. Defaults to 'de'.
